steps.description: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife
steps.modified_description: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with hand

errors.description: Cut the muffin into two pieces with hand

steps.description: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray
steps.modified_description: Coat -Coat a mircowave safe bowl with cooking spray

errors.description: Coat a bowl than ramekin cup with cooking spray

steps.description: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup
steps.modified_description: Pour-Crack inappropriately while pouring 1 egg into the ramekin cup

steps.description: Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set
steps.modified_description: Microwave -Continue to Microwave on high for 1 min

steps.description: Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa
steps.modified_description: Top -Top cup with 1 teaspoon of salsa

errors.description: Top the cup with 1 teaspoon of salsa

steps.description: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup
Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce
Microwave -Microwave just until cheese melts, about 10 seconds
Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce
replace -replace the top of the English muffin

errors.description: Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 30 seconds
